title: Bicycle Parking Station PTH-AP schema
description: Bicycle Parking Station Schema meeting Passenger Transport Hubs AP Schema specification

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be BicycleParkingStation

ParkingFacility.capacity.description: Property. Capacity of a civic structure. Model:'http://schema.mobivoc.org/#capacity'.

Capacity.total.description: Property. Model: 'http://schema.mobivoc.org/#totalCapacity'. Indicates the capacity of a resource.

InfrastructureElement.geometry.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/locn#geometry'. The geometry corresponding to the infrastructure element.

Geometry.wkt.description: Property. Model:'http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#asWKT'. Geometry expressed in wkt format.

validity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Includes the validity period for this forecast as a ISO8601 time interval. It can be also used two separate attributes: `validFrom`, `validTo`.

validFrom.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Validity period start date and time.

validTo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Validity period end date and time.
